## `SetBarChartBarEffect`

Sets bar appearance (in bar charts\index{graphs!bar charts}) for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetBarChartBarEffect(BoxEffect barEffect)
```
### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`BoxEffect`](#boxeffect) barEffect | The used to display bars in bar charts. |
:::
